name: Format\Photo
description: The component for including a photograph.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of an image file.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: A caption that describes the photo. Note that this property differs from caption: although the caption can be displayed to users, the accessibilityCaption is used by VoiceOver for iOS only. If accessibilityCaption is omitted, the caption value is used for VoiceOver for iOS.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A caption that describes the image. This text can be used by VoiceOver for iOS if accessibilityCaption is not provided. The caption text will appear in a full-screen view of the photo. It will not appear in the main article view. To display a caption in the main article view, use a Caption component.

properties.name: explicitContent
properties.description: Indicates that the image may contain explicit content.

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of photo.
